name: 休闲游戏合集
description:
Game introduction [/ h2]

The collection of casual games is a collection of famous casual games called "Little Overlord".

At present, the first open casual game for the "three elimination" game
This game play is similar to bejeweled, candy Crush Saga such elimination of the famous, on the basis of retaining its basic functions, the level of optimization and reconstruction.

Three elimination game gameplay introduction

Base 3 identical bricks can be eliminated when matched
4 identical bricks can be combined to form a powerful item when matched

Special elements:
Two blocks of special elements meet before they are broken

Special block:
Colored bricks will only be destroyed if a match occurs between adjacent bricks
A brown brick is broken only if a match occurs between adjacent bricks.
Grey bricks cannot be destroyed

Collection:
Fruits are automatically collected when they reach the bottom of the level.
